thread.title: Sandero stepway

author: Sandero stepway
title: Sandero stepway
text: Excellent service, quick fitting and well priced. Fitter replaced the tyres without any adverse effect on the tyre pressure sensors in the valves which was my only concern in getting it done on the side of the road. Very professionally done and completed during the time slot they stated they would arrive in. Will be getting tyres from them all the time in future and recommending them to all my friends and family.
